GET_ONLINE_DESCRIPTION:
Your new internet plan is ready to roll
with a quick and easy eSIM installation.
Just a heads-up: most eSIMs
are a one-and-done deal. If you remove it,
itâ€™s gone for good.
ACTIVATE_TITLE:
How to activate your
Global Internet Bundle
ACTIVATE_INFO_MESSAGE: You can install your eSIM using one of the methods below. If you have any questions or need help you can message usâ†’
INSTALL_ESIM_QRCODE_DESCRIPTION: Scan the QR code by printing out or displaying the code on another device to install your eSIM. *Make sure your device has a stable internet connection before installing.
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_1: Go to 'Settings', tap 'Network & internet', then tap '(+)' next to the SIMs section, if it's not available tap 'SIMs/Mobile network' on your device.
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_2: Tap 'Download a SIM instead?', then tap 'Next'.
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_3: Tap 'Use a different network' if you need to confirm your network.
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_4: Scan the QR code, then tap 'Download/ Activate'.
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_5: Tap 'Settings/Done' when you see the Download Finished screen.
INSTALL_ESIM_MANUAL_DESCRIPTION: Copy this information and enter details manually to install your eSIM. Make sure your device has a stable internet connection before installing.
MANUAL_INSTALL_STEP_1: Go to 'Settings', tap 'Network & internet', then tap '(+)' next to the SIMs section, if it's not available tap 'SIMs/Mobile network' on your device.
MANUAL_INSTALL_STEP_2: Tap 'Download a SIM instead?', then tap 'Next'.
MANUAL_INSTALL_STEP_3: Tap 'Need help?', then tap 'Enter it manually'.
MANUAL_INSTALL_STEP_4: Enter the SM-DP+ Address & Activation Code by copying it, tap 'Continue', then tap 'Download/Activate'.
MANUAL_INSTALL_STEP_5: Tap 'Settings/Done' when you see the Download Finished screen.
